data.system_settings: Android 4.4.2 Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 7.0 and Android 6.0.1 Samsung Galaxy J3 (6)
data.actual_result: It says you have no DM unread
data.expected_result: You should have a dm should tell you that you have a DM unread
data.short_description: You recieve a DM from someone, and you log off Discord. When you log on, the DM notification is gone, making you manually go to the unread DM.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a dm (do not click on it) - Leave discord close it - Open discord
